comment.author: 41909278@N08
comment._content:
The NA-20 was oiginally fitted (as seen here) with a Wright R975 engine and in this configuration was showcased for the Chinese. This eventually led to significant purchases by that country. However, at the time, the aircraft was re-fitted with an R-1340 engine and sold to Honduras. This sale later resulted in the sale of 2 more, nearly identical, but armed, aircraft under the designation NA-42.

Doug MacPhail
